frontmatter.title: Build a Database Pt. 1: Motivation & Design
frontmatter.description: Learn the motivations and designs behind building a simple LSM-Tree based Key-Value Store style database, similar to RocksDB.

frontmatter.title: Build a Database Pt. 2: MemTable
frontmatter.description: Build the first component of an LSM-Tree database, the MemTable. We look at how RocksDB designed their MemTable and build our own.

frontmatter.title: Build a Database Pt. 3: Write Ahead Log(WAL)
frontmatter.description: Guild to building a Write Ahead Log(WAL) for a LSM-Tree database. We look at how RocksDB designed their WAL and build our own for our database.
